ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the mobile phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Mobile_Phone__c ) && NOT(ISNULL(Mobile_Phone__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Mobile_Phone__c)) && !REGEX(Mobile_Phone__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Mobile_Phone__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Mobile_Phone__c)) && !REGEX(Mobile_Phone__c,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for mobile phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
